page.title: New Iomega Wireless Servers Bring New Features amp; Flexibility to <b>...</b>
page.text: SAN DIEGO, Sept. 16 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- Iomega Corporation , a global leader in data storage, today announced the release of the new Iomega(R) NAS 100d entry-level network-attached storage (NAS) server.
